name: Astonishingfacts
0:
”Alexa open astonishing facts”
”Alexa ask astonishing facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell astonishing facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: astonishing facts
des:
Ask for Astonishing Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Astonishing Facts provides fun to the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Astonishing Facts" or "Alexa, open Astonishing Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
